interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Cancun Collection Cacao Body Bronzer – Superfood Infused Sunless Tanning Lotion with Cacao 5.1 fl.oz, For Instant Tan in 1 minute.
Review Date: 2020/02/04
Store: Cancun Collection
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Cancun Collection', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Material Feature': 'Antioxidant', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 4.6 x 1 inches; 14.39 Ounces', 'UPC': '659436986640'}
Review Text: This Cancun Collection Cacao Bronzer is a fabulous alternative to getting a natural suntan from a tanning bed or from the sun due to harmful UV rays. It is also a great alternative if you do not like using self-tanners that can smell. This applies easily and blends with all skin tones. I have fair skin, but this even works on my skin color too. The bronzer blurs imperfections and stays on until you shower with soap!  I recommend this product!  See my pictures for more information.
Review Title: Great, natural looking bronzer!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

It does not tangle at all and is easy to use.
Cons: The brush made my hair a little flat, but I have thin, fine hair that requires work to create body. Great for smoothing and straightening hair! profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preferences:** 
  - Light-weight hair tools for ease of use.
  - Focus on functionality, specifically smoothing and straightening capabilities.
  - Preference for brushes that do not tangle hair.
  - Interest in skin care products that offer effective results without harmful chemicals, especially alternatives to sun exposure.

- **Hair Type Consideration:** 
  - Utilizes products designed for fine hair, attentive to their impact on body and volume.
  
- **Experience with Products:**
  - Generally satisfied with product performance, indicated by a positive average rating.
  - Recognizes the balance between functionality and specific hair needs, such as maintaining hair volume, while also appreciating products for skin care that provide natural finishes and ease of application.

- **Overall Trends:**
  - Values efficiency in styling tools.
  - Attributes importance to both usability (easy handling and effective results) and personal hair characteristics (understanding certain tools' limitations on fine hair).
  - Demonstrates an inclination for products that enhance natural beauty and offer quick, effective solutions, reflected in positive experiences with bronzers that provide a natural look and blend easily, indicating a preference for versatile and user-friendly beauty products.
